I am a new teacher and looking for more casual to dressy clothes to wear to school. My normal go to are activewear and I just don’t feel like that’s very professional so I’ve been trying to update my wardrobe. The classrooms are very cold so I’ve been looking for a warmer sweaters that have a dressy casual vibe.  I do wear leggins and was hopeful this may be long enough to cover my butt. This product is cute. It does look just as advertised material is OK, but also pretty thin. It’s definitely not a sweater more like just a long sleeve shirt. I am keeping it, but not really impressed. I’m 5’11 and 150lbs I ordered a med. fits well but just not as long as I wanted and again very thin. I really wish I’d stop advertising this type of materials under sweaters. I actually have long sleeve shirts that are thicker than this material.
